summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 VOLKSWAGEN TOUAREG. WHILE OCCUPYING THE VEHICLE, THE SEAT BELT WARNING LIGHT ILLUMINATED ON THE INSTRUMENT CONTROL PANEL. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALERSHIP AND THE TECHNICIAN STATED THAT THE PASSENGER AIRBAG NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.  THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE 88000. UPDATED 11/23/09. *LJ  UPDATED 11/24/09.*JB
